cuepoints.caption: Welcome to the Virginia Lottery Learning Link web-based retailer training!
In this course, you will learn about the latest and greatest in self-service lottery technology, the Gemini Touch terminal.
We are going to begin by discussing the hardware components of your new terminal,
including the built-in Touch Screen display.
Then we'll move on to the Retailer Home screen, loading and unloading Scratcher tickets as well as maintaining the terminal in your store.
First, let's talk about the benefits of the Gemini Touch.
The size and weight of the terminal provide high security for money and tickets.
For security purposes, an alarm will notify you of any access to the terminal.
The internal Cash Box is also protected by a separate lock and key.
The touch-enabled Player Display, supports a 42" diagonal wide high definition Touch Screen.
It features technology that presents colorful, eye-catching graphics to capture the attention of your players.
Customers can purchase both Scratch Off and Draw games without assistance which means less people tying up lines at the counter.
